困.definition: to trap; to surround; hard-pressed; stranded; destitute

困守.definition: to stand a siege; trapped in a besieged city

困惑.definition: bewildered; perplexed; confused; difficult problem; perplexity

困擾.definition: to perplex; to disturb; to cause complications

困獸猶鬥.definition: a cornered beast will still fight (idiom); to fight like an animal at bay

困難.definition: difficult; challenging; straitened circumstances; difficult situation

困頓.definition: fatigued; exhausted; poverty-stricken; in straitened circumstances
